# Building Detail Rooms Sorting (UI)

Storypoints:: 3

- Sort Room Type and Room Variant on Frontend side
- Sort Room Variant in Room Type
- Sort Room Type in Building Detail
- Sort by
	1. Availability
	2. Price (ASC)
